typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 unpivot(output(
		avgrating as string,
		genres as string
	),
	ungroupBy(year),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> Unpivot1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(year),
	avgrating = avg(Rating),
		genres = first(split(genres,'|')[1])) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(avgrating = toString(avgrating),
		genres = toString(genres)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Unpivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
